about_the_game:
1973. You are entering a world full of mysteries and horrors, taking on a new job that throws you into abandoned houses, frozen in time and filled with ghosts of the past. Your guide is the mysterious notes left in the house for you, indicating what you are to do next.





There's nothing special about the main character, John. He's just an ordinary guy, with no particular skills or knowledge about the supernatural, and it's not because of a better life that he had to work as something like an exorcist. All he has is his ability to joke at the most inappropriate moments and his unique ability to talk to himself when he's scared or feeling lonely.






In "Exiled into Darkness", you encounter souls that cannot leave these walls, and your task is to decipher what holds them here. Each house has its own unique story and its own horrors that you will have to uncover.

name: Exiled into darkness

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660S
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: 1973. A world full of mysteries and horrors. Accepting a new job, you find yourself in abandoned houses, frozen in time and filled with ghosts of the past. Your guide is the mysterious notes left in these houses, which indicate what you are to do next.
